Class ActionBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simplity.tp.ActionBlock

    DbClientInterface

    public class ActionBlock
extends Object
implements DbClientInterface
    block of actions. we have created this as a class to improve re-use across service and loopAction

    simplity.org

    • Method Detail

      • workWithDriver

        public boolean workWithDriver(DbDriver driver)
        Description copied from interface: DbClientInterface
        use an instance of rdbDriver to take care of all your rdb operations. Note that the rdbDriver instance will work only inside this method. You should not keep a pointer to this instance beyond this method. However, even if you do, the instance CAN NOT be used for any rdb operation, because it would have released all resources.
        Specified by:
        workWithDriver in interface DbClientInterface
        Returns:
        true if operation is successful. All operations are committed. False in case any error, in which case operations are rolled-back.

      • act

        public boolean act(DbDriver driver)
        act on all the actions
        Parameters:
        driver -
        Returns:
        true if we completed all actions. False if a stop was encountered and we stopped in between.
